entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:12 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: S 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening then light before morning. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers. High 7. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
